title: No Mouth But Some Serpent's
description: Fandom: Harry Potter--------------------------------------------------AU of CoS, Slytherin!Harry. Harry goes back to Hogwarts, determined to protect his brother Connor, the BoyWhoLived, and stay in the shadows. But last year two people learned the truth about Harry... and this year, two more will.Cover art by Sockcat (deviantart.com).
author: Lightning on the Wave
